ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html [h1]Transport Pod MK2[/h1] Adds a new transport pod that can carry 5000kg (vanilla is 150kg) Adds a new Pod Launcher that can hold 1600 fuel (vanilla is 150) Reaches anywhere on the planet Pod launcher is compact: 1x1 compared to vanilla 2x1 Adds new research required: Transport Pod MK2 运输舱MK2 新增了一种新型运输舱，可以携带5000kg重量的物品（原版为150kg） 新增了一种运输舱发射器，可以填充1600单位的燃料（原版为150单位） 运输范围包括整个星球！ 更紧凑的运输舱发射器，仅占地1X1，原版为2X1 需要研究运输舱MK2以解锁 时间戳：2019年3月23日 01:12:04 [h1]Zip download[/h1] Please check my github repo for direct downloads of my mods: https://github.com/ww9/rimworld [h1]Todo[/h1] Reusable pods All-in-one pods (no launcher required) Buildable floor area to determine where pods land in base. https://i.imgur.com/dVWtaf6.jpg
